summary: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.
cast: Bruce Gleeson|Eddie Ritchard|Garry McDonald|Bailee Madison|Carolyn Shakespeare-Allen|Katie Holmes|Guy Pearce|Jack Thompson|Julia Blake|David Tocci|Lance Drisdale|Nicholas Bell|Libby Gott|James Mackay|Emilia Burns|Alan Dale|Trudy Hellier|Terry Kenwrick|Grant Piro|Todd MacDonald|Angus Smallwood|Dylan Young|Guillermo del Toro|Abbe Holmes|Richard Davine|Lisa N Edwards|Kim Ross
title: No tengas miedo a la oscuridad
